p1_text:
My name is Lukas Inschlag, currently living in lower Austria.
I studied business infromatics at the University of Technology in Vienna and currently work as Business IT Manager. Aside from that I occasionally develop apps for the Android plattform.
ex_line4: 01/2016-07/2017 IT Support at Hirtenberger AG (1d per week)
ex_line5: 08/2017-Today Business IT Manager at Hirtenberger AG (4d per week)
ed_line1: 2005-2009 Junior high school: 'Don Bosco Real-, Aufbau- und Aufbaurealgymnasiums' in Unterwaltersdorf, Lower Austria
ed_line2: 2009-2013 Senior high school: 'Don Bosco Real-, Aufbau- und Aufbaurealgymnasiums' in Unterwaltersdorf, Lower Austria
ed_line3: 2013-2017 Bachelor program Business Informatics, University of Technology, Vienna
ed_line4: 2017-Today Master program Business Informatics, University of Technology, Vienna
